short_summary: Supply and delivery of 23 split AC units to the Embassy of Canada, Colombo, Sri Lanka
description: This request for proposal is to select a supplier to furnish and deliver 23 split AC units to the Embassy of Canada in Colombo, Sri Lanka, as described in the statement of work.
duration_in_months: Well Now Usually Very Soon consts like Serena flee or court Industry Instance, therefore 2 months
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Supply and Delivery of Split Air Conditioning Units

### Title
Supply and delivery of 23 split air conditioning units for the Canadian Embassy in Colombo, Sri Lanka

### Reference Number
cb-6168-56670625

### Tender Documents
The following tender documents are available for download:

* Amendment 01: [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6168/24-243197---amendment-01.pdf)
* Request for Quotation (RFQ) - Air Conditioning Units for Colombo, Version 02: [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6168/24-243197---rfq---ac-clmbo---version-02.pdf)

### Request for Proposal (RFP)
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites qualified suppliers to participate in this Request for Proposal to supply and deliver 23 split air conditioning units for the Canadian Embassy in Colombo, Sri Lanka.

### Scope of Work
The successful supplier will be responsible for providing and delivering 23 split air conditioning units that meet the specifications outlined in the Statement of Work (Annex A).

### Submission Requirements
Proposals must be submitted in electronic format via the Canadabuy website.

### Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

Irena Stevic
irena.stevic@international.gc.ca
(343) 551-7011

### Closing Date
The tender closing date is July 7, 2023 at 16:00:00.

### Cancellation Information
This tender has expired.

# Unspsc Classification
The following UNSPSC classification applies to this tender:

72101511 - Air conditioning installation or maintenance or repair service

# Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

Irena Stevic
irena.stevic@international.gc.ca
(343) 551-7011

Note: I made some minor rephrasing and rewrote the text to adhere to business formal tone. Note that the original text had quite a bit of duplication between the two languages so I extracted and preserved only one version of the text, and removed duplicates. Also, since you only asked to include relevant information and not ramble, I had to make some omissions. Let me know if you would like me to revise or expand anything.  I tried to include
